Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory101.png'}
{3: 'And so, you accompany Ayla to the modern art exhibition upon her invitation...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "My piece won't be displayed here until later, but we can at least look at others' artwork and get hyped for the event.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Commandant, let go on in.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Commandant, have you heard about the life of Eugene Nakahara?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Look! It\'s Lina Ono\'s "Magenta Wave"!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After taking a big lap around the exhibition hall, Ayla is now filled with excitement...'}
{3: 'Full of energy at a time like this, no one would have guessed that she works late into the night...'}
{3: 'Ayla stops in front of a picture titled "Early Spring".'}
{3: 'She seems full of regret... but why?'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "This paint... is an old piece of mine. Maybe it's here as a replacement for the original exhibit.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'It\'s not my best work... It\'s too constrained and pays too much attention on expressing "objective existence."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'But looking at it now... it seems as if this is a reminder not to be constrained to such a simple "form"...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The exhibition is closing...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Sorry for making you be with me all day.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'So... How did you know that the question mark could be filled in?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Regardless of how you did it...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I think I got some inspiration.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Think I can trouble you for a bit tomorrow?', 4: '1'}
